message.content: hello claude a bigger project where I need your subagents and some planning. we will essentially compare and take inspiration from. another git branch with ansible code we gave forked before. now this has been a playground so it's all over the place. but the roles 01/02, variables and other Settings are OK and should stay but otherwise I'd like a worktree setup which Works on cleaning up and using the other got branch as the guide

content.text: I'll help you set up a worktree to clean up your Ansible code by comparing it with another branch. Let me start by understanding your current repository structure and branches.
Successfully changed chat title to: "Ansible cleanup with git worktree"

toolUseResult.text: Successfully changed chat title to: "Ansible cleanup with git worktree"

content.text:
I see this is your dotfiles repository, not an Ansible repository. Could you clarify:

1. Do you have Ansible code in another repository that you want to work with?
2. Which branch contains the Ansible code you want to use as a reference?
3. Are you looking to set up a worktree in a different repository, or are you planning to add Ansible configuration to your dotfiles?

<options>
    <option>I have a separate Ansible repository - let me navigate there</option>
    <option>The Ansible code is in a different branch of this repo</option>
    <option>I want to add Ansible configs to my dotfiles using another repo as reference</option>
    <option>Let me provide the correct repository path</option>
</options>
